description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in SurveyJS Survey Creator v.1.9.132 and before, allows attackers to execute arbitrary code and obtain sensitive information via the title parameter in form.

Vulnerabilidad de Cross Site Scripting (XSS) en SurveyJS Survey Creator v.1.9.132 y anteriores, permite a los atacantes ejecutar código arbitrario y obtener información confidencial a través del parámetro de título en el formulario.
